channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lampost put side number 27 not working, 30th October
item.description:
Junction is not functioning making it darker at an area where there are crossings and turnings

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cumberland Drive, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping outside my house, 30th October
item.description:
People have been flytipping outside my house for some weeks. There is a sink, a hob, a sideboard, a bit, some wooden boards and other household waste items. They're all leaned up against the back of my house which is 24 Watts Street. Other people have now started adding rubbish to the pile and it's a complete state. I've tried asking neighbours but noone knows who is doing this. It's unsafe for the children and animals on the block. I hope this can be dealt with quickly. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Watts Street, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooding!!!!!!, 30th October

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 145, Masons Hill, Widmore, London

item.title: Second abandoned car opposite another, 30th October
item.description:
Another abandoned vehicle on the same stretch of road. Vauxhall DU14 YLB with MOT expired in June 2025 and again the parking attendants have ignored this! Car has not been moved since April or May. How are the parking attendants able to ignore these cars on a school road? The car registration plate would immediately show it is illegally parked on public land without an MOT, same as the car opposite Toyota RA62 FUT which has been parked there over a year.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pelham Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo, 30th October
item.description:
There is dog poo everywhere on the walkways and stairs on Pollard walk. My 6 year old son stood in some earlier on today and ruined his trainers. This was on the stairway walking up to the houses on pollard walk. Then I've just gone outside to put our pumpkins out and there is now dog poo outside my front door! Someone us walking there dog on pollard walk and letting it poo everywhere. There is also poo outside my neighbour across from me near the ramp walkway. It's disgusting and unhygienic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pollard Walk, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Northbound light keeps getting stuck on red, 30th October
item.description:
Northbound light coming down the hill on Camberwell grove keeps getting stuck on red. This is causing issues with traffic backing up on the narrow part before the lights. 2 or 3 cycles have been going green on the other 2 lights before this one goes green. Issue has been present since at least Tuesday 28th october
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camberwell Grove, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet
